p: Intraspecific variability in NTAP resistance may also exist. Indeed, Galvin et al. ( 2013) and Burts et al. ( 2009) have reported differences of around 1 log cycle of inactivation among S. aureus strains exposed either to helium-based or air-based plasmas. Similar results have been described by Niemira ( 2012) for a group of E. coli O157:H7 strains exposed to air plasmas.
